FSoETest.Name: Manual FSoE Slave State Machine Test

History.HistoryEntry: Where: global Reason: The test does not recognize different slave and master message length during the init phase. Solution: Initialisation values for FSoEFrame type added
Where: #5.1e, #5.1f Change Request: 2015-11-05-001 Reason: Run to DATA state should be tested with different parameter. (MinSlaveAddress, MaxSlaveAddress). Solution: New Test Cases added.

Where: RUN_DUT_TO_SESSION Change Request: 2015-12-15-001 Reason: Test function RUN_DUT_TO_SESSION re-calculates the CRC if it is equal to the old CRC (New = True). The Slave state machine specification defines that this should not be done in this transition (New = False). This only happens in the case that the calculated CRC = 0x0000. Solution: "Calculate New" parameter of the IS_CRC_CORRECT macro is set to false for every Session transition. Requires FSoE version greater than 1.2.1.0
Where: Test Change Request: -- Reason: Build version should be incremented for a working group review release. Solution: Build version incremented
Where: #5.1e,#5.1f Change Request: 2015-11-05-001 Reason: Test exception due to missing c_tmpByte test variable Solution: Test variable added to testcases
Where: Test Change Request: -- Reason: Minor version should be incremented for ETG release. Solution: Minor version incremented

Where: Test functions: ResetOK, SESSION_STAY1, SESSION_STAY1, SESSION_STAY1_INCREMENTED_CRC0, SESSION_STAY1_DECREMENTED_CRC1 Change Request: 2017-02-22-001 Reason: The 'SecondFrameSent' functionality was not tested correctly for DuTs with one byte initialisation data length. Solution: Test functions and cases extended for a correct 'SecondFrameSent' behaviour.

Where: Test functions: RESET_OK, Reset_OK, CONN_RESET1, DATA_RESET1, PARA_RESET1 Change Request: 2017-03-02-001 Reason: From the master state machine point of view the OldSlaveCrc contains the CRC0 of the last received slave frame and is used to validate the CRC of the next received slave frame. Until now this variable is only updated by the IS_CRC_CORRECT macro or it is reset (=0) by an action of a specific state of the master state machine. But the variable has to be set every time a new slave frame is received. Solution: Test functions (named above) changed to set the OldSlaveCrc manually.
Where: Test Change Request: -- Reason: Minor version should be incremented for ETG release. Solution: Minor version incremented

FSoETest.Comment: Manual test cases of the FSoE state machine. A user interaction is needed for each Test Case. To pass this Test, check first the description of the Test Case and configure the DuT as described. Then start every Test Case separately.

TestVariable.Name: LastCrc
TestVariable.Comment: Die CRC_0 des zuletzt gesendeten Master Frames.

TestVariable.Name: OldMasterCrc
TestVariable.Comment: Die CRC_0 des zuletzt gesendeten Master Frames.

TestVariable.Name: t_oldSlaveCrc
TestVariable.Comment: Die CRC_0 des zuletzt gesendeten Slave Frames.

TestVariable.Name: CommFaultReason
TestVariable.Comment: Zeigt den Fehlercode bei einem Kommunikationsfehler an

TestVariable.Name: t_watchdogExpiredCount
TestVariable.Comment: Zeigt an wie oft der Master Watchdog ausgelöst hat
